message.content:
I need to identify the costs related to general management and administration of the entity as a whole.

Looking at the income statement, I need to find the specific line item that represents administrative expenses.

In the income statement provided, I can see the line item "Administrative Expenses" with a value of 13300.90. This line item represents the costs of general management and administration of the entity as a whole.

Therefore, the value I need to extract is 13300.90.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '13300.90'} }
```
